description.value:
Level 7: Greater Overchannel

Your mastery of Rage deepens, allowing you to push beyond safe limits â€” at great personal risk.

Overchannel Limit. Your maximum Overchannel Rage stacks increases from 2 to 3.

Per-Stack Benefits (while raging). Each Overchannel stack grants the following benefits while raging:

  • Your Rage Damage bonus increases by +2 per stack.
  • You gain a +1 bonus to Strength saving throws.

Escalating Risk. Each Overchannel stack increases your Frenzy DC by +3 instead of +2.

If you Overchannel to 3 stacks, you must make a Frenzy check when your Rage ends (this check is mandatory and cannot be waived).

The Frenzy DC cannot exceed 20 + your proficiency bonus.

Automation Notes. Overchannel stacks, Rage damage, and Frenzy checks/DC are handled by your Rage/Frenzy workflow. This feature provides the rules modifiers and reminders.
description.chat: Greater Overchannel (Level 7). Max Overchannel stacks 3. While raging: +2 Rage damage per stack; +1 STR save per stack. Frenzy DC increases by +3 per stack (max 20 + PB). If you reach 3 stacks, Frenzy check is mandatory when Rage ends.

effects.name: Greater Overchannel (Reminder)
effects.description: Reminders only. Apply Overchannel stack bonuses and Frenzy DC adjustments manually per the feature description.
